item.description:
The dance is cancelled, due to the blizzard.  If you need some way to expend energy, you can come to my house, only a few blocks away and help shovel.

 

Refreshments provided.  No admission fee.

Come dance to a six-piece band led by the dynamic singing of Sweet Willie D. Willie's band plays stupendous jump/swing blues that will knock you off of your feet! This is a dance not to be missed.

 

Dance lessons begin at 7:45, live music from 8:30 to 11:30.   $15 cover charge covers both.
item.name: Cancelled - Swing with Sweet Willie D and the Continental Walk
